text: Known for her ponytail hairstyle with highlights and cat eye makeup, Ariana ’ s style is admired by many across the globe. What makes her stand out is the boldness with which she wears her style and how good she looks with it. The person behind this amazing of Ariana revealed some tips on television recently that could help others attain the same look. Although he started by saying he wasn ’ t supposed to reveal the industry ’ s secrets, he gave some amazing makeup tips that are not only easy but can yield awesome results when used appropriately. According to the makeup artist, the first step is to apply creamy eyeliner at the end of the eyebrows towards the iris but not going all the way since that can close off the eye.
